name: Datapane
slogan: An API for building data-driven dashboards
description:
Datapane is building a next-generation BI platform which enables a new class of data developers to use the new open source data ecosystem instead of old proprietary platforms. Our product is an API which provides the easiest way to share and embed results from open source analyses.

Datapane is backed by over 15 top-tier investors and angels from London and San Francisco, who have funded companies such as Uber, Zoom, ClassPass, and Pintrest.

jobs.title: Data Science Evangelist Intern
jobs.description:
We are looking for a data science evangelist to join our team for the summer, where you will help create example analyses and content, and grow Datapane's user-base by engaging with the data science community.

Datapane is an API and open source framework for BI and reporting in Python, so we are looking specifically for someone with a technical data background who wants to be more focused on outreach and knowledge sharing. 

Experience in Python data analysis is a pre-cursor, and you should be familiar with Jupyter, pandas, and be comfortable picking up visualisation libraries like Bokeh and Altair. Previous experience of data science blogging or open source contributions would be a great indicator of fit. 

The work will vary day to day, but will include elements of:
- Planning and developing new data science content, such as building examples analyses and templates 
- Reaching out to people publishing content on Twitter, GitHub, and Reddit, and helping them convert it to Datapane

You should like the idea of interacting with customers and the community and planning and writing content. You'll be working and liaising with a talented team of domain experts, data scientists, and backend engineers, and will have extensive scope to build the outbound messaging.

**Please note: this is a technical role and requires proficiency in Python data analysis.**
